verbose_text: The knockdown of CEBPA in human hepatocellular carcinoma suppresses the colony formation and cell growth of Hep3B and Huh7 hepatocellular carcinoma cells via lowering the expression of cyclin A and CDK4, suggesting that CEBPA plays an oncogenic role in hepatocellular carcinoma XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
evidence: expression of cyclin A and CDK4
